## Source: amazon-inspector (e37b562070e10c7c2cf1ae07233d0e676a9c3808a2425407b709e9d03ab981f8)
The package x402-legacy was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (212b72c1aeec9d8183880dcea9446486d90bff46d4892f7ec52e536fe0c71b17)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'x402-legacy' @ 3.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
